io.netty.resolver.dns

Interface DnsCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDnsCache, NoopDnsCache

    @UnstableApi
public interface DnsCache
    A cache for DNS resolution entries.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cache(String hostname, InetAddress address, long originalTtl, EventLoop loop)
      Cache a resolved address for a given hostname.
      void cache(String hostname, Throwable cause, EventLoop loop)
      Cache the resolution failure for a given hostname.
      void clear()
      Clears all the resolved addresses cached by this resolver.
      boolean clear(String hostname)
      Clears the resolved addresses of the specified host name from the cache of this resolver.
      List<DnsCacheEntry> get(String hostname)
      Return the cached entries for the given hostname.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all the resolved addresses cached by this resolver.
        See Also:
        clear(String)

      • clear

        boolean clear(String hostname)
        Clears the resolved addresses of the specified host name from the cache of this resolver.
        Returns:
        true if and only if there was an entry for the specified host name in the cache and it has been removed by this method

      • get

        List<DnsCacheEntry> get(String hostname)
        Return the cached entries for the given hostname.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname
        Returns:
        the cached entries

      • cache

        void cache(String hostname,
         InetAddress address,
         long originalTtl,
         EventLoop loop)
        Cache a resolved address for a given hostname.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname
        address - the resolved adresse
        originalTtl - the TLL as returned by the DNS server
        loop - the EventLoop used to register the TTL timeout

      • cache

        void cache(String hostname,
         Throwable cause,
         EventLoop loop)
        Cache the resolution failure for a given hostname.
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname
        cause - the resolution failure
        loop - the EventLoop used to register the TTL timeout
